participant_abstract.sent: Yep we've now decided what all the concepts for the remote are going to be.

participant_actions.sent: ID and UID are working together to build some prototype models for the next meeting, ME is looking into product evaluation.

participant_decisions.sent: We've decided the unit's going to be made of rubber and the unit's going to be powered using kinetic energy.

Other units cause repetative strain injury where as ours does the opposite; as you play with the rubber casing you are actually preventing this from happening and also you are powering the kinetic part of the unit (this is our main marketing concept).
The user interface is of simple rubber push button type with the possibility to suppliment this with a key lock function (much the same as on mobile phones).

participant_problems.sent: Marketing department seems to want to over complicate the device, but does have some good ideas.
